thread.title: 'Ahalya' makers back with another short film 'Nayantara's Necklace' starring Konkona and Tilotama
thread.title_full: 'Ahalya' makers back with another short film 'Nayantara's Necklace' starring Konkona and Tilotama - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Ahalya' makers back with another short film 'Nayantara's Necklace' starring Konkona and Tilotama
text:
Konkona Sen Sharma's hard hitting act in Meghna Gulzar's 'Talvar' has been applauded worldwide. And even as the film and her performance continues to garner praise, the actress is back in yet another brilliant act.
In a short film titled 'Nayantara's Necklace' backed by Royal Stag Barrel Select Large Short Films, Konkona Sen Sharma and Tilotama Shome are seen portraying the friendship between two totally opposite personalities .
READ: Talvar: The film that will shake your beliefs
Royal Stag Barrel Select Large Short Films had presented 'Ahalya', a short film starring Radhika Apte and Soumitra Chatterjee in the lead.
Watch: Trailer of Nayantara's Necklace
